abstract.t: This document proposes requirements for a Remote Direct Memory Access (RDMA) Protocol to run on TCP and SCTP transport protocols. An RDMA protocol provides a general facility for extremely high efficiency (low CPU cost per unit of data transferred), end-to-end data transfer. An RDMA protocol enables high efficiency data transfer by allowing network interfaces with hardware support for the RDMA protocol to perform zero-copy data transfer directly among application buffers.
